85847.summary: Some customers in the Fort Richmond area of Winnipeg are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
85847.title: Jan 5 - Winnipeg (Fort Richmond) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
